body.bibl: Tamcke, Martin. “Learning from Each Other, with and against Each Other: Aspects of the History of Encounters as a History of Learning for Middle Eastern and European Christians.” In Levant, Cradle of Abrahamic Religions: Studies on the Interaction of Religion and Society from Antiquity to Modern Times, edited by Catalin-Stefan Popa, 275–90.
